name: google-calendar-mcp-server-extension
description: The Google Calendar MCP server offers a comprehensive set of tools for managing calendars and events within a user's Google Calendar account.

tools.name: list_calendars
tools.description: List available calendars from user's Google Calendar account.

tools.name: create_calendar
tools.description: Create a new secondary calendar in user's Google Calendar account.

tools.name: get_calendar
tools.description: Fetch metadata of a calendar from user's Google calendar account.

tools.name: update_calendar
tools.description: Update metadata of a calendar in user's Google Calendar account.

tools.name: delete_calendar
tools.description: Deletes a secondary calendar from user's Google Calendar account.

tools.name: list_events
tools.description: List events from the user's Google Calendar.

tools.name: get_event
tools.description: Get event details from the user's Google Calendar.

tools.name: create_event
tools.description: Create a new event in the user's Google Calendar.

tools.name: update_event
tools.description: Update an existing event in the user's Google Calendar.

tools.name: delete_event
tools.description: Delete an event from the user's Google Calendar.

tools.name: clear_primary_calendar_events
tools.description: Clear all events from the user's primary Google Calendar.

oauth_credentials.title: Google OAuth 2.0 Credentials
oauth_credentials.description: Path to the credentials.json file downloaded from the Google Cloud Console for OAuth 2.0 authentication.
